Other Information.Additional Info: The porous structure of MIL-100(Fe)-250 provides size-exclusion effect, selectively removing organic pollutants such as enrofloxacin.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Presence of humic acid (10 ppm and 30 ppm)
Other Information.Additional Info: Humic acid molecules are excluded from the porous structure due to their larger size, demonstrating the size-exclusion capability of MIL-100(Fe)-250.

Experimental Validation.Method: Breakthrough experiment, EPR spectroscopy, DFT calculations
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: ENR degradation rate: 100% within 15 min, quasi-steady-state concentration of OH: 4.18 x 10^-12 M

Other Information.Additional Info: Dehydrated MIL-100(Fe)-250 exhibits enhanced charge transfer, Fe(III) reduction, and H2O2 activation efficiency, leading to superior removal of organic pollutants.
